Name: A.DIMO
AboutMe:
I’m IT Project Engineer responsible of customers projects being the technical interface between the customer and the delivery team. This implies the analysis of the customer requirements, preparing the technical documentation, follow up of the project, participating in testing and delivering of the system with correct functionality, quality and safety within the agreed contract.

I’m Software Architect responsible for designing and developing of complex projects based on platform mixing open source and licensed products for the following markets: public transport, food and beverage, industry and media.

SPECIALTIES Project engineering, requirements management, design and system integration (test methods, factory acceptance and site acceptance system tests). Agile software development and IT Service management.

TECHNICAL SKILLS N-layer applications, database design, cloud based solution design, responsive web sites, oop paradigm programming and design patterns, uml, c#, objective-c, t-sql, asp.net mvc, web services, web api, entity framework, nhibernate, html, css, javascript, jquery, angularjs, nodejs, grunt, bootstrap, Visual Studio, Xcode, Sql Server, MongoDB, Mysql, Windows Server, OSX, GIT and TFS.
